entry.title: Wednesday: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets. High zero.
entry.summary: Freezing rain mixed with ice pellets and risk of a thunderstorm. Wind east 30 km/h. High zero. Wind chill near minus 9. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Rain at times heavy. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Rain at times heavy ending before morning then cloudy. Risk of freezing rain and a thunderstorm this evening. Risk of a thunderstorm late this evening and after midnight. Local rainfall amount 20 to 30 mm. Wind east 20 km/h becoming light late this evening. Temperature rising to plus 3 by morning. Forecast issued 11:39 AM EDT Wednesday 5 April 2023
